column2: This character is currently in a system with a hospital pharmacy, giving them an overall increase in health.
This person has ordered new eyes grown for them.  They should be ready three months after the order was placed.
This person has ordered a replacement limb grown for them.  It should be ready about a year after the order was placed.
This character leads a confederal polity.
This character leads a federal polity.
This character is the hegemon of a polity.
This character leads a unitary state.
This character's government maintains a middling level of civil order.
This character's government maintains a strong level of civil order.
This character's government possesses a senatorial legislative body.
This character is either elected by subordinates or appointed by a superior.
This character is either elected by subordinates or appointed by a superior.
This character is either elected by subordinates or appointed by a superior.
This character's government does not permit autonomous local governance.
This character's government permits autonomous local governance.
The executive office of this character's government is up for election every year.
The executive office of this character's government is up for election every four years.
The executive office of this character's government is up for election every six years.
The executive office of this character's government is up for election every eight years.
